title: 48 hours passed and I still not receive any OTA to downgrade to Android 10 from Android 11 Beta 1
content: Ok, i sideloaded OTA Android 11 DP4 package then OTA update to Beta 1, after that I opted out my device from beta program but 48 hours passed and I still not receive any downgrade OTA package. What should I do now ? My device is verizon so I cant unlock bootloader to flash factory image or any other flash tools
